reactNative.description: Code-hinting, debugging and integrated commands for React Native
reactNative.command.runIosDevice.title: Executar no Dispositivo iOS
reactNative.command.runExponent.title: Executar Expoente
reactNative.command.startPackager.title: Iniciar Empacotador
reactNative.command.stopPackager.title: Parar Empacotador
reactNative.command.showDevMenu.title: Exibir Menu Dev
reactNative.command.reloadApp.title: Recarregar App
reactNative.command.runInspector.title: Executar Inspetor de Elementos
reactNative.snippets.debugAndroid.descri: A new configuration for launching react-native app on android
reactNative.snippets.debugiOS.descriptio: A new configuration for launching react-native app on iOS
reactNative.snippets.attachPackager.desc: A new configuration for attaching to packager
reactNative.snippets.debugExpo.descripti: A new configuration for launching Expo app
reactNative.attach.program.description: The path to launchReactNative.js in the vscode folder
reactNative.attach.sourceMaps.descriptio: Whether to use JavaScript source maps to map the generated bundled code back to its original sources
reactNative.attach.outDir.description: The location of the generated JavaScript code (the bundle file). Normally this should be "${workspaceRoot}/.vscode/.react"
reactNative.attach.sourceMapsPathOverrid: Um conjunto de mapeamentos para reescrever as localizações dos arquivos fontes de onde o sourcemap aponta para os seus locais no disco. Veja o README para detalhes.
reactNative.attach.address.description: Endereço TCP/IP da porta de depuração. O padrão é 'localhost'.
reactNative.attach.port.description: Debug port to attach to. Default is 8081.
reactNative.attach.remoteRoot.descriptio: A raiz de origem do host remoto.
reactNative.attach.localRoot.description: A raiz de origem local que corresponde a 'remoteRoot'.
reactNative.attach.skipFiles.description: Uma matriz de nomes de arquivo ou pastas, ou padrões glob, para serem ignorados quando estiver depurando.
reactNative.launch.program.description: The path to launchReactNative.js in the vscode folder
reactNative.launch.target.description: Device target to run on (either device or simulator)
reactNative.launch.sourceMaps.descriptio: Whether to use JavaScript source maps to map the generated bundled code back to its original sources
reactNative.launch.logCatArguments.descr: Arguments to be used for LogCat (The LogCat output will appear on an Output Channel). It can either be an array such as: [":S", "ReactNative:V", "ReactNativeJS:V"] or a string such as ":S ReactNative:V ReactNativeJS:V"
reactNative.launch.outDir.description: The location of the generated JavaScript code (the bundle file). Normally this should be "${workspaceRoot}/.vscode/.react"
reactNative.launch.runArguments.descript: Run arguments to be passed to 'react-native run-<platform>' command(Override all other configuration params)
reactNative.launch.env.description: Variáveis de ambiente passadas ao programa.
reactNative.launch.envFile.description: Caminho absoluto para um arquivo que contém definições de variáveis de ambiente.
reactNative.launch.variant.description: A variant to be passed to react-native run-android, e.g. 'devDebug' to specify --variant=devDebug
reactNative.launch.scheme.description: A scheme name to be passed to react-native run-ios, e.g. 'devDebug' to specify --scheme=devDebug
reactNative.launch.skipFiles.description: Uma matriz de nomes de arquivo ou pastas, ou padrões glob, para serem ignorados quando estiver depurando.
reactNative.configuration.title: React-Native configuration
